concept.title: get
concept.shortdesc: Display an entry in a region.

conbody.p: Availability: Online. You must be connected in gfsh to a JMX Manager member to use this command.

row.entry: Required. String or JSON text from which to create the key. For example: "James", "100L" and "('id': 'l34s')".
Required. Region from which to get the entry.
Fully qualified class name of the key's type.
The default is the key constraint for the current region or String.
Fully qualified class name of the value's type.
The default is the value constraint for the current region or String.
Explicitly enables or disables the use of any registered CacheLoaders on the specified Region when retrieving a value for the specified Key on Cache misses.

conbody.codeblock: gfsh>get --key=('123') --region=region1 Result : true Key Class : java.lang.String Key : ('123') Value Class : java.lang.String Value : ABC
